short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Instagram followers & following lists with one click. Simplify data gathering for analysis. Support CSV, JSON, Excel formats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Follower Exporter for Ins is a powerful tool that simplifies gathering followers and following data from Instagram profiles. You can export valuable information for social media analysis and strategy development with just one click.

Key Features:
• One-click export of followers and following lists
• Multiple export formats: CSV, JSON, Excel (XLSX)
• User-friendly interface
• Local data processing for enhanced privacy

How to Use:
1. Go to any Instagram profile
2. Click the download button next to "followers" or "Following"
3. Monitor progress in the pop-up window
4. Click "Download Items" to save data in your preferred format

Perfect for:
• Social media managers
• Marketers
• Researchers
• Business owners

Unlock the potential of your Instagram network data with Follower Exporter for Ins!

Data Privacy:
We prioritize your security. All data processing occurs locally on your device and is never transmitted to our servers.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with META Inc.
